I can guide you through Citizen Data Science Program https://seagatetechnology.sharepoint.com/sites/SeagateCitizenDataScientistCommunity/SitePages/Citizen-Data-Scientist-Certification-Program-Overview.aspx
Offering support for CDS program

patterns: Give me a list of tracks in Citizen Data Science program
List all tracks in CDS program
Which program is good for me?
responses: Navigating to Citizen Data Science Program Website https://seagatetechnology.sharepoint.com/sites/SeagateCitizenDataScientistCommunity/SitePages/Citizen-Data-Scientist-Certification-Program-Overview.aspx

patterns: Whom to contact to get more details?
Who is the go to person for information about CDS
How do i register for the different tracks?
responses: Please email us at cds@seagate.com

patterns: How many levels are there in CDS?
responses: We have 2 to 3 tiers based on the track chosen. Tier 1 covers basics of Data Science, Tier 2 covers machine learning algorithms and Tier 3 has individual projects

patterns: How can I show off my certification?
Can I share my certification on Linkedin?
responses: CDS team has put together badges, which can be shared in Seagate emails. The certification can also be shared on linkedin

patterns: Whom to contact to get more details?
Who is the go to person for information about CDS
How do i register for the different tracks?
responses: Please email us at cds@seagate.com

patterns: What is the cost to be paid?
Does my manager pay for me?
responses: The program is free to join

patterns: How do I start my project?
responses: For details, you can refer to https://seagatetechnology.sharepoint.com/sites/SeagateCitizenDataScientistCommunity/SitePages/CDS-Tier-3-How-To.aspx

patterns: How can i get a project mentor?
responses: The CDS Team will help Tier 3 participants find a mentor. Participants are requested to send in their project proposals first.
For details, you can refer to https://seagatetechnology.sharepoint.com/sites/SeagateCitizenDataScientistCommunity/SitePages/CDS-Tier-3-How-To.aspx

patterns: Can I do my project as a Career Discovery?
How can I use Career Discovery?
responses: Yes, you can use a Career Discovery project, so long as the project sponsors agree together with the mentor and the relevant CDS requirement can be met

patterns: How do I activate the Udemy license
responses: To activate the udemy license, please click on the link provided by Udemy in the activation email
Tier 1 and Tier 2 of the CDS program are

patterns: Do I have to take all tiers?
Do I have to enroll in all the tracks?
responses: No, you do not have to enroll in all tracks and all tiers. You may complete only one tier or focus on all tiers of only one track

patterns: Can I defer to next wave?
I have changed role, can I defer to next wave?
I am busy with my work projects now, can I defer to next wave?
responses: Yes, you can defer to the next wave. Please email cds@seagate.com , if you would like to proceed with the deferment

patterns: what is the link to the udemy website?
I am unable to access udemy site
responses: To access the udemy website for the purpose of CDS please go to seagatescience.udemy.com

patterns: I am unable to access Udemy learning path
Where is the udemy learning path?
I cannot find the learning path
How do I find the learning path?
responses: Log on to seagatescience.udemy.com , Click learning paths located at the top left corner of the screen and enroll the learning path you are assigned to
